titles.title: To authorize and direct the Committee on Appropriations to create a new Subcommittee on Veterans' Affairs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Rules and Organization of the House.

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Directs the Committee on Appropriations to establish a new Subcommittee on Veterans' Affairs with exclusive subcommittee jurisdiction over the Department of Veterans Affairs and its programs.
